website_summaries.verdict: The ideal choice for users that want a full-functioning mini projector at a mid-level price.
pros: Stands out for its ability to run on batteries for hours
Offers bright projection, especially in low-light settings
Easy to set up and convenient for use with multiple files
Comes at a mid-range price point
cons: We found that the focus control is difficult to use
The design is bulkier than similar models on the market

website_summaries.verdict: The AAXA P300 Pico Projector offers WXGA (1,280 by 800) native resolution, a claimed 300-lumen brightness, a roughly one-pound weight, and the ability to run on batteries.
pros: Reads files from USB memory key and memory cards

customer_reviews.title: It was wonderful until it stopped working suddenly and for no apparent ...
customer_reviews.text: It was wonderful until it stopped working suddenly and for no apparent reason. The picture was crisp, operation was simple and it was relatively quiet. However, about a month after I bought it, it suddenly stopped working and I returned it and received a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Peleg

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous picture quality for such a small projector
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant little projector. The internal speaker is rubbish but you can get over that. The quality and brightness of the picture is outstanding and it is with out doubt better than I had expected. The tripod is ok but the unit itself is so light and portable I just hope that the lamp lasts as long as they say it does.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Webb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: does over heat on occasion - but is the best mini projector i have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: pico
customer_reviews.text: Good quality mobile projector. Good connectivity but somewhat.spoiled by fiddly battery connection and comming with us power adapter even though ordered from UK
customer_reviews.author: ROBERT JENKINSON

customer_reviews.title: There maybe better projectors available
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, not as bright as expected, colours too red even when manually adjusted, difficult on screen menu, a very plasticy feel & tripod not worth having. There maybe better projectors available
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product being so portable and the multi connections allow easy viewing options.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. Nutt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome piece of kit!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of kit! Use it nearly every night as work away from home mainly so watch films etc in Hotel room. Makes life a bit more bearable!! Excellent quality picture from a tiny machine like this is unreal. Well recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. D. R. Cley

customer_reviews.title: Stop working after one week.
customer_reviews.text: Its a great projector, bright and portable but it died after a week. Just stopped turning on so I am returning it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Roger O'donnell

customer_reviews.title: I bought this two years ago and the bulb went ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this two years ago and the bulb went out. I contacted the manufacturer and they told me that they do not have replacement parts for their products and offered me a discount to buy a new one (discounted price was $20 lower than what I could by a new one on amazon). I spent $400 on a product that lasted 2 years with no way to repair it. AAXA just got two thumbs down but not backing their own products.
customer_reviews.author: Brad F

customer_reviews.title: Lousy Product
customer_reviews.text: It never worked properly and now has stopped working at all. I bought it on February 3 and it is April 27 and I find out I cannot return this POS. I will never buy a product from this company again It is January 2018 and the second one has died. This is two units and three batteries. Never will I buy anything from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Jennings

customer_reviews.title: Gets the important stuff right, not much else
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Excellent contrast. Blacks are black. And this thing is BRIGHT for how small it is. -Simple operation. -Having an internal battery is neat. -Image quality overall is pretty darn good. Cons: -Noticeable "rainbow" effect when scanning your eyes across the screen, but no worse than other DLP projectors -Poor color handling and image tearing when using HDMI (wrong colorspace, some kind of wrong sRGB handling), you should use VGA when possible -Feels like cheap plastic and weak case design (creaks when you push the buttons)
customer_reviews.author: Ben W

customer_reviews.title: Super portable for your deployment needs ;-)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this back in 2014 for my deployment to Afghanistan. It served me well while I was there constantly providing myself and my platoon entertainment. It wasn't the brightest in our tents during day time hours while we were just chilling but it was bright enough. And at night it was great. Lasted over 4 years. Still works but overheats and shuts itself off. Time to replace. But this projector was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Logan S. Guthrie

customer_reviews.title: The LED light went out after less than 20 hours.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this projector. the LED light went out after only a few hours. unfortunately, it is out of warranty, and they didn't even act like they wanted me to send it in for repairs. they suggested I just toss it, but offered me a small discount on a new one.. No Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G Anderson

customer_reviews.title: I had one of these die...twice!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this once, and after a month it stopped working. Because it had great reviews (here and via The Wirecutter) I assumed this was a fluke; I was able to get it replaced with a new one at no cost. I ordered the new one 4 months ago and it just died again. Now the return window is closed. Stay away!
customer_reviews.author: kristina d budelis

customer_reviews.title: Compact size. Good performance. Some drawbacks, but ok.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and is bright enough for a standard meeting room presentation. That said, the focus mechanism is both difficult to adjust and depending on the distance, hard to focus. For the price, the manufacturer could put a better focus dial in place. It is light and very plastic. The black finish is not a plus in that it smudges pretty easily. The tripod is functional but flimsy. The positive is that they now include the battery. I had a couple of questions about the unit, and their customer support was awesome. Product gets four stars because for the compact size, it is really a good projector. Time will tell on the quality. I
customer_reviews.author: Yo

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my client did not have a projector. I had originally purchased a different one that was 100 lumens but was left with disappointment that the projector simply could not beam a bright enough image on the wall in low-light conditions. I, in turn, purchased this one with 500--and wow, what a difference! The only draw back - you will get just 1 hour - maybe less - of juice out of the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Projector
customer_reviews.text: I occasionally travel internationally to teach and securing a projector for power points can be difficult. I chose this projector due to it's sized and reasonable price. Before my last trip to Manila, I set it up in my office with all the florcent lights on and it cast a decent picture approximatley 8 feet across using a light colored olive wall. The only challenge I had was a dark PPT slide background was a little dark. While in Manila, I used it on a standard projector screen and it worked great. Even cast it from my I Pand mini 4
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, but no battery included
customer_reviews.text: Nice size and fantastic picture quality. The included stand makes it easy to place on your table or desk much easier than stacking a bunch of books or boxes! I recommend projecting from a laptop via HDMI and using a Bluetooth speaker (I haven't tried the projector's built-in speakers because I don't have any content in an old format it will recognize). I'm confused, though, because my unit doesn't seem to have a battery despite the product listing stating it should have one... now I suppose I need to buy one, because the power cable really limits the options for placing the projector conveniently.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Orth

customer_reviews.title: When I did it was good, considering its size
customer_reviews.text: the problem was that I didn't use that much, perhaps 5 time. When I did it was good, considering its size. The last time I used it was more than 7 months ago. Worked perfectly. Put it aside. When wanting to use it again it was kaput. Needs to be replaced. Can't be fixed. It is not the power brick that is not functioning. I have two bigger projectors that are 3 times older and I use them a lot for long periods of time and never had a problem. So the tiny ones need to be a bit more long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Renoux

customer_reviews.title: Not the brightest, but works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Worked well in a courtroom, but we had to dim the lights, and some courts don't allow that. Will probably have to purchase another with greater light output to replace this one. No problems, and works as advertised, with the few shortcomings that other reviewers have pointed out.
customer_reviews.author: DrBobG

customer_reviews.title: It is a good projector for darker environments
customer_reviews.text: It is a good projector for darker environments. The image adjustment knob is a little cheesy, but not too big of a problem. The projector does work as advertised and is very easy to set up. The mini tripod is very cheap and it is unfortunate that they could not provide something with just a little more quality and stability to it. The overall quality of the product is questionable when you feel the focus knob and see the tripod. It makes you wonder where else they would have cut corners within the product. It does work, however I was a little disappointed with the brightness and the previous features mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much performance in this little gem
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small room presentations. Pretty good throw even when the room is still lit but best in the darkest environment possible. It takes a little 'getting used to it' time to understand best adjustments but you can reduce or eliminate keystoning easily. The LED bulb is a huge plus - doesn't run hot and will last a good long time. Bought a customizable carrying case. It's super portable and perfect for on-the-go presentations. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: RocketDog

customer_reviews.title: Bright, clear picture.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good unit. Pros: - Bright, clear picture quality. - Relatively compact. - Comes with connecting cables. Cons: - relatively expensive. - focus wheel is small & touchy to focus. - there is a color shift in the red spectrum from orange-red to magenta. - unit is small but not pocketable; a bit larger for travel than one might like. - fan is manageable but a bit noisy. - Not Bluetooth compatible. Does not have a connection cable for iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: I purchased it to show a power point presentation from ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it to show a power point presentation from my Ipad. All aspects of the website description indicate that should be possible. As it turns out - apparently you do not have licensing to use Mac products with the remote to the projector. I was told I had to convert the powerpoint to JPEG's & then use a thumb drive to show the presentation. While this does work - it takes out the "presenter's view" that would show on a computer or iPad - therefore no notes can be viewed this way. It is NOT what I was looking for & again the description was not accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ruth T. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: So far so great
customer_reviews.text: Just tested it out by projecting an image on a white wall from about 6’ in a daylight lit room. Super clear and bright! Oh and it comes with a lightweight table tripod..didn’t see that in the description. Need to get an HDMI cable in order to project from ipad/iphone.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Atwell

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. I got this as a birthday gift for my partner and only a couple months later it is broken. The screen is randomly a weird pink color even though we have taken excellent care of this item. Unfortunately I can not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Perret

customer_reviews.title: Great size, resolution and brightness! Perfect for smaller office presentations and working sessions.
customer_reviews.text: Great projector! Awesome resolution and brightness for a projector with this small of a footprint. Fits easily in my MacBook 15" computer bag and is bright enough for in-office presentations of graphic designs, prototypes, movies and software walkthroughs/demos. Need a small projector that is super bright and crisp for office presentations? This one works perfectly for me and my user experience design team. Operation on battery alone lowers brightness substantially, but plugging it into a power source enables full-lumen capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: ZF

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality picture for a portable projector
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality picture for a portable projector. I bought it from different site which costed me little less. Just the volume isn't good on the device. If u plug it to a speaker or home theatre receiver system this is solved. Happy I bought it and would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: SARAVANAKUMAR

customer_reviews.title: I may not keep it
customer_reviews.text: The focus feature is really awkward and hard to use. The roller dial for focus seems to skip past the focus spot and doesn't roll very smoothly. I wish it came with the cable to hook to an ipad/iphone...I'm still trying to figure out what cord to buy for that. It did however connect very easily to my laptop and broadcast my screen with no trouble. The cord provided for connecting VGA was too short--barely long enough to move from one side of the laptop to the other.
customer_reviews.author: Reader_SLC

customer_reviews.title: This projector has a great picture and overall is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This projector has a great picture and overall is easy to use. However, it is too noisy. I saw at least three reviews here that said it was quiet. I would suggest those people get to an ENT doctor asap! Also, running a presentation with the projector and no laptop doesn't work the greatest---remote is tricky and sometimes slides advance or don't advance depending on how you push the buttons. Presentations run much more smoothly when the projector is attached to a laptop. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: MARVY77

customer_reviews.title: Great powerpoint for a room.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a team meeting instead of renting from the hotel which would have charged 2x as much to rent one for the day as buy this. Crazy. And this turned out to be crazy good. Can't comment on video...yet.
customer_reviews.author: mjmd

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 5 years if mimimal use then quit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on Amazon in 2013 (the 300 lumen version) and really enjoyed the performance. Since then I’ve used it 4 times a year for approximately 1 hour each time and today it started shutting down after 30 minutes use. So... after less than 30 hours total use, it’s now useless.
customer_reviews.author: berfle

customer_reviews.title: Great for my work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I can travel with a mini projector. It works well, I use it for internal presentations, the quality isn't good enough for a client-facing presentation in a big room but works great for my purpose. Only issue is that it isn't to stable as it is small, you accidentally knock the power cord it pulls the projector. The best benefit is hotels charge $500+ a day for a projector so I have saved a ton using this for my internal meetings.
customer_reviews.author: DAZ

customer_reviews.title: Noisy fan and sensitive focus
customer_reviews.text: I like the contraption, but man, it sure is noisy. Don't buy it if you're thinking of using is in a small, quiet space. These are great for open spaces. Other than that, the keystone function only works for horizontal distortion, not vertical. UPDATE (a couple years later): The projector is still kicking. Have to refocus every time before using it, which is annoying. The edges of images have this weird silhouette, but you can barely notice it. It's ok. I like how portable it's been. It's still too noisy for my taste.
customer_reviews.author: megaman_ultimate

customer_reviews.title: Projector works great at the office
customer_reviews.text: Projector works great at the office. It will work in a lighted room for work and very portable for carrying in laptop bag with pc. Very easy to hook up and present, matter of a couple minutes. I haven't tried with phone yet but will be soon. I even tried this with a movie while travelling and was very surprised how well it looked on a green hotel room wall.
customer_reviews.author: MrParadigm

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic projector and great value
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic projector and great value. We take this on our holiday trips and once hooked up to the iPod Touch and UE Boom Speaker you have a home theater that anyone will want to have. We had this putting out at least an 8" screen for the kids and it was a fantastic hit. It was nice and clear and bright enough for all to enjoy. It is easy to setup and control and is the perfect size to take anywhere. We added the battery that gives another option but this is a great unit.
customer_reviews.author: JKB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid that when turning the projector on the image quality was going to be enough for my presentations which are usually done in not so dark rooms. But I was over-satisfied with the image quality and the capacity of those 300lumens. Easy to use, good accessories such as the tripod and VGA connector. In general I'm totally satisfied with this purchase and hope to enjoy for many hours this product.
customer_reviews.author: Esklando

customer_reviews.title: Projector
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES this!!! We did have some difficulty connecting iPhone and iPad with the USB connector the projector didn't seem to recognize this outlet so I went to apple store and purchased for $120.00 the apple TV box and HDMI cord which I would recommend in addition to this. It was delivered as promised and if I had patience for techno issues I would have called company for issue but (I am certain it was something I missed) but with the apple box it is phenomenal!!!
customer_reviews.author: Leisa

customer_reviews.title: Great size, good quality, Not so great in big conference rooms with bright lights
customer_reviews.text: So, hands down, this is an awesome product in an amazing size. I've used this one since I bought it (a week ago) I held a 100 person meetup and it performed well. The build quality is good. I can't complain about the performance. Cons: The lumens are very low on this. I had to turn off most of the lights in the 100 person room to get a good view of the projection. If you have to have bright lights in the room, this may not work well for some.
customer_reviews.author: G. Pedroni

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for office meeting presentations. We have a small group (8) in a relatively small space and this suited our needs perfectly. Easy to transport, lightweight, easy set up with iMac. You will need a thunderbolt to HDMI adapter. Powerpoint presentations look great. Projector set up about 7 feet from screen on mini tripod (included), keystone adjustment easy. Focus easy, very clear picture. Bright enough for our needs, best with room slightly dimmed.
customer_reviews.author: Tigerbird

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these for my school for teachers and administrators to use for conference presentations. I have tested it and I am going to order more. This is a fab projector. I tested the projector using an iPhone, iPad, iMac, and Samsung Chromebook. With all devices, the projector worked beautifully. The VGA adaptor comes with the projector. You do need the 30 pin to VGA or Lightning to VGA adaptors to attach iPADs to the projector. But those are also available from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Owens

customer_reviews.title: The little projector that could
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! Works well, even in a brightly-lit room light, projecting onto a wall. Used it for three days straight - 9 hours a day, no problems; the internal battery gives you a little added flexibility. As others have noted, the focus knob is a little sensitive, and the tripod tends to slide around (rubber-tipped feet would be an improvement), but if you need a portable projector, take a look at this.
customer_reviews.author: S. SMith

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 1 year before breaking
customer_reviews.text: Lamp went out after 1 year of use. It worked ok and was very portable. The included tripod does not work - definitely replace.
customer_reviews.author: Hypatia

customer_reviews.title: worked right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: not much to dislike. micro sd card has to be inserted with copper contacts facing up.
customer_reviews.author: Great Cook

customer_reviews.title: Nice and bright. Fan is really loud.
customer_reviews.text: This is probably a nice projector. It's pretty bright and the resolution looks fine, but the fan is SUPER loud. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Jewett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing picture for such a small projector
customer_reviews.text: Battery is not included. Also it is a good idea to purchase an extra battery or two if you plan on using it where there is no electricity. The battery is somewhat difficult to change though and that is the only drawback. Works perfectly to plug in a HD or USB and run your movies/music videos. The speakers are nothing though so make sure to connect speakers of your choice.
customer_reviews.author: Stefan

customer_reviews.title: Good, but the color is off.
customer_reviews.text: I open the project and it is easy to set up. I am sure it is a nice projector. But, the color is off, and I went to the menu and tried to adjust it. But it does not matter where I set color # 1 to 50, the movie I was playing looked the same. It is too RED. Any suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Ching Juhl

customer_reviews.title: Still working!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector 2 years ago and use it every day. I also bought the Li battery for it. The battery sucks so I don't really use it without plugging it in. That being said, it is nice and portable. The image is decent. I am not the person that needs to see the pores on the faces of the characters. I would say it was worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Not Too Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit to replace my Brookstone Pocket projector because of the 300 lumens. The project is bright and clear when focused. My issues were with the focus - hard to focus and when it was focused, needed to refocus during use. The remote was not very responsive. needed to press the button several times and then it would skip over my suggested setting. Seemed to be lagging. The color is off with the green grass on a football field being lime green and the yellows are sooo bright. It just seemed to me that the colors were not matching the typical colors from the brookstone projector. Thinking about returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn L.

customer_reviews.title: The first one was wonderful, until we dropped it and it started making ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I've purchased. The first one was wonderful, until we dropped it and it started making a very bad buzzing sound....so we ordered this one to replace it...only it is nowhere near as good...it doesn't seem to have the same brightness or clarity as our first one of these. What happened? Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wish I knew they came out with a newer one
customer_reviews.text: So far it’s been nearly two weeks and this projector is working great. I haven’t had any issues yet. One thing I dislike is the tiny remote with very sensitive buttons. If you press the buttons a little too hard it double taps. I had issues just trying to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: zachary troxel

customer_reviews.title: Like other reviewers have stated
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers have stated, the main design flaw with this projector is the focus knob or gear, it is small and difficult to easily access and because it is made out of plastic I don't have much confidence in its ability to withstand wear and tear. On the plus side the projector is much brighter than I expected and it is now my main projector.
customer_reviews.author: A. Chong

customer_reviews.title: Sound isn't good for presenting but that wasn't an expectation
customer_reviews.text: I'm speaking all over the place and this portable projector has answered in every situation. So far no issues with battery draining too fast. Sound isn't good for presenting but that wasn't an expectation. It's easy to hook up an external speaker.
customer_reviews.author: M. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little presentation projector
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little presentation projector. Clear and sharp picture, light and compact, has a battery too so no power is always needed. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: jim davis

customer_reviews.title: Size and quality
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought several of these for my team to use in training. It is compact but full of features. Easy to use with laptop or tablet. Comes with necessary cables and a nice tripod. Great to travel with
customer_reviews.author: Valerie S. Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, no case included
customer_reviews.text: I plugged it in and charged the battery for a couple hours and it worked great. The picture quality was good for a projector this size. I tested movies, a PowerPoint presentation, and even a PDF document of which all met or exceeded my expectations of such a compact device. My only complaint is that it did not come with a case. For the amount of money inspect I would have liked to see a nice padded carry case instead of a cheap flimsy tripod.
customer_reviews.author: Chazzie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice litt
customer_reviews.text: This projector is a great size for on the go presentations. Super clear, throws a large visual and battery seems good but I’ve mostly used it connected to power cord. Only downside is that it’s not Bluetooth enabled (at least I don’t believe it is)
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very good picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good picture quality . It has various output ports that makes it compatible with all the channels . I use it for my outdoor patio and connect it with an ion Bluetooth speaker for audio .
customer_reviews.author: M. Narayanankutty

customer_reviews.title: Good picture, very difficult to focus
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the quality of the picture (I purchased for my office for presentations), however it is very difficult to focus. The focus mechanism is a small wheel on the side of the lens housing that is difficult to move to make fine adjustments to the focus. When it was in focus it was great, but it also tended to go out of focus and need to be re-focused. The remote was also not very responsive. If the quality of the unit was just a little better it would be great. I returned it to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Anthill

customer_reviews.title: Love this projector!
customer_reviews.text: This projector is so cool! I love the fact I can use it on battery power for presentations. I was surprised at how large the projected size can be from this tiny projector. The sound from the speakers is useful only for pre-screening, but it plugs easily into a portable speaker. It's portability and functionality delights the audience.... and me!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Portable amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: After having a bad experience with another brand projector, I find this one is quite reliable. I was eagerly waiting for this one. I loved this portable amazing product. Picture is quite bright & sharp even in the day light (in my room with 2 window open). Though it's costly, I'll recommend to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: Includes a Battery.  No Need to Purchase Separately.
customer_reviews.text: Projector Already Comes with A Battery. That wasn't clear in the description. I ordered a battery to go with it and found out I don't need it. They're not that quick to swap; so, keeping a spare handy doesn't really make sense.
customer_reviews.author: A. DeSanto

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector?
customer_reviews.text: Worked everywhere I used it for briefings from my tablet computer with PowerPoint. Was always bright enough for its purpose, and the small size and light weight cannot be beat. I also used this to project movies in my hotel room without a computer, and even projected a movie on the backseat of a commercial airplane during flight!
customer_reviews.author: Reality Check

customer_reviews.title: broke twice the first year
customer_reviews.text: When the projector broke the first week we were glad the company replaced it. But 5 months later it broke again. Very fragile device. This is supposed to be portable and designed for traveling. Now I'm stuck with the second broken device. Bummed
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Ring

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy electrical work in production makes for a short lifespan.
customer_reviews.text: Mine died after about 15 minutes on it's first real use. (I'd turned it on prior to make sure it worked..) It started flickering, with the LED indicating it seemed to be cycling between on and off rapidly, so I shut it off. Subsequently, switching it back on gives a faint clicking noise and flashing top LEDs at the same rate, while power stays green but no image. Since it seems to be getting worse, I stopped to make a return here before it caught on fire. As much as I'd love to open it up and investigate the failure mode, this isn't worth it. Should have paid closer attention to the other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought this 3 years ago and love it. Better than TV with the large viewing ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 3 years ago and love it. Better than TV with the large viewing area. I usually connect a chromecast to it. Only drawback is it needs a pretty dark room.
customer_reviews.author: Roshan F.

customer_reviews.title: This is probably the best thing I've ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best thing I've ever bought. I bought it as a gift for my boyfriend and we use it to watch Netflix on the ceiling in our bedroom. It works perfectly even pointed straight up. The only drawback is that everyone thinks its some kind of webcam when they see it in our bedroom... kind of embarrassing!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Dark Room
customer_reviews.text: Because you sacrifice lumens for size, the projector needs a very dark room to be visible. But that's to be expected when buying one small enough to fit in the palm of my hand. Fantastic product, durable enough to withstand a tour in Afghanistan (With proper care) and still working as if it were new six months after my return home.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn F Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Tiny and very useful
customer_reviews.text: Works well to project websites from one laptop so the whole group can see it and work on website together. Will buy the battery next to use when there is not a plug in handy. Had need of that in a Rotary meeting this week. Like the Travel Case we bought to protect it. Using a separate box for accessories, extension cords, tripod, etc. Both go in a small bag that fits easily in a compartment in the back of the Jeep. Easy!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Riefenstahl

customer_reviews.title: Best Buy of the Year
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my best purchases of 2014. I can never find a projector at work so I carry this and its accessories in a mens Kelvin Klein travel kit, it all fits in my breifcase with my laptop. People I work with LOVE it and the pircture quality is better then the big ones at work. I would recommend this to anyone looking for a compact projector.
customer_reviews.author: BMK

customer_reviews.title: This is good little projector
customer_reviews.text: We have only used it once for an important meeting and it worked perfect. Those who complain about the focus knob are just looking for something to complain about. This is a very small unit so all the controls are small. We found it works best and easiest with an HDMI cord.
customer_reviews.author: Tulbox

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Amazing bang for the buck. Tested it in a desert screening (where there is no power source) and loved the fact that it runs on batteries!
customer_reviews.author: fiatlux

customer_reviews.title: This is the Projector I've been waiting for!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been considering purchasing a projector for years and was waiting until they became more affordable and versitile. This projector is everything I hoped for! I projects well in even a fully lit room, no warmup/cooling down time, no bulb burnouts, multiple easy input options and as portable as those junky little ones they sell at the designer gadjet stores for roughly the same price range. This one is as almost as good as the $1k ones I use at work! I have no idea why these aren't sold at every department store and electronic store!!!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas M Werkmeister

customer_reviews.title: Great projector.
customer_reviews.text: It's a micro projector so no matter what it's not going to be a super bright / sharp image but this has a great picture. Way better than Dell or Brookstone. Don't buy Brookstone! Dell aren't bad really but this one works very well. Worth the extra money to buy the battery that is sold separately and a little tripod for it.
customer_reviews.author: JTB

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this projector to go with our Apple TV and blue tooth speaker, so that we don’t have the black hole of a television on our wall. It’s been absolutely fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Langford

customer_reviews.title: Plesently surprised!!
customer_reviews.text: This product works great, just used it in a hotel training room (room held 50 people or so), hooked up easily and i did not have any focus issues. I had a smaller projector before and basically had to have all the lights off to use it. This one worked well with the lights on, i was really surprised. I did use it on a projector screen, so i don't know how much that difference that made. Great value considering hotels charge more than the cost of the unit for rental equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Casper

customer_reviews.title: Great projector with a lot of features just two complaints
customer_reviews.text: Needed a decent projector to travel with and to handle the quick impromptu meetings in offices. Wanted something better than the 85-90 Lumens range of the Pico projectors but small enough to fit into my laptop bag. This project handles those scenarios very well and can be seen even in a well lit office (your mileage will vary based on the color of the wall!) Two Complaints: -Doesn't come with the battery back, you have to purchase that separately -Would be extremely helpful if had a protective case for traveling or at least a cap for the lens
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo C.

customer_reviews.title: Great picture!!!
customer_reviews.text: Now this is my favorite projector,out of the five that I've purchased. Best value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Ward

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Does as advertised, but you will want to connect a speaker to it for watching TV or movies.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Dadey

customer_reviews.title: Super bright for its size!
customer_reviews.text: This thing packs a punch! I'm using it to project visuals on my bedroom wall for DJ sets. I paired it with an iPad AV adapter to take the VJing on the road!
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Bought a few of these for the directors at work ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought a few of these for the directors at work (per their request), and I must say that I am impressed by the image quality. If you need to do a presentation in a smaller room, such as an office or small conference room, then this is for you. We'll see how long they last.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Amazing little projector
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little projector, is comming uith battery already mounted no need to order. The only downside is no zoom to make the image smaller or bigger. Very fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW!
customer_reviews.text: I was not expecting this great a picture. Worked quite well in a dim room and exceptional in the dark. It also goes larger than 120". Didn't have room to move back further to see just how large it would go and still be able to focus. The speaker is pretty useless as is the flimsy tripod.
customer_reviews.author: DJCTop Contributor: Fishing

customer_reviews.title: Its vvery easy to carry when visitng clients on my Vespa and ...
customer_reviews.text: This little projector has a handful on a small package. Its vvery easy to carry when visitng clients on my Vespa and as a backup when having meetings with designers and developers on my team. Buy also Amazon sugested carrying case. Overall, hassel free and crisp, detailed images with normal lightning conditios. Very recommended
customer_reviews.author: Federico M. Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous projector
customer_reviews.text: I use this projector with my ipad to show students clips form YouTube, or real time videos of themselves dancing. What an awesome tool, simple to use, wonderful picture. The speakers are not great, if you want SOUND I would suggest getting external speakers to help enhance the sound.
customer_reviews.author: L Williams

customer_reviews.title: You'll love it! Simple and functional.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the easiest pocket projectors to have and use. Not only is it compact but it also gives very nice colors to the items you're projecting that's color. It works pretty well in dim lighting as long as you have it properly focused. I've owned this aaxa p300 since 2012.
customer_reviews.author: Karnew06

customer_reviews.title: It's the perfect pocket projector!
customer_reviews.text: Love my pocket projector, it's bright enough for most viewing situations, it's lightweight, crisp and the colors look fantastic! The battery makes it very portable and it has plenty of input options... My only complaint is that the focus dial is hard to fine tune, please fix that!! So I'd give it 4.5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Markus NYC

customer_reviews.title: We watched a movie afterwards and felt like I was in a movie theater
customer_reviews.text: Wow. I bought this for my husband's birthday to watch the Warriors game life size in our living room at the party. I can't believe this tiny thing can give such a vivid picture. Even on a beige wall, the white displayed as white. We watched a movie afterwards and felt like I was in a movie theater. Very easy to use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This is the best. It is light and small enough to carry in my laptop and powerfull. I was at a presentation and asked to show the audience some material i had worked on. Instead of connecting to the main projector, i coupled the P300 to my laptop and made the presentation on a second wall. Very effective.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bondy

customer_reviews.title: awesome pico projector!
customer_reviews.text: great lil projector, just wish they would release a 4k model soon, also would be great if they could reduce fan noise
customer_reviews.author: B. Marley

customer_reviews.title: If you live in Canada do not order this product from Beach Camera
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to start by saying this product is exceptional, hence the 4 star rating. This picture is bright and produces a very large image over a short throw distance which is nice in an apartment with limited space. However, ordering this product from Beach Camera I was given a shipping cost, and later received an additional invoice from from FedEx to cover a hefty $96 customs fee. This put the price of the projector close to $600. Again I love the product, but if you get it in Canada, get it from a distributor in Canada so you don't have to pay this ridiculous fee. Cheers.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Ritchie

customer_reviews.title: Best Pico project I have found yet.
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting for this. Best Pico project I have found yet. The stand it comes with is a bit cheap but not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use - great price
customer_reviews.text: Previous projectors did not have the ease of use that this one does. No more turn everything off, plug in, turn things back on in a particular order, or else it doesn't work. I haven't gotten to do an actual presentation with it yet, but the picture it very good. All in all, I can't say enough good things about it!
customer_reviews.author: Secret One

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for small size
customer_reviews.text: Love it. good color and brightness even in room with moderate lighting. Nice detail, even when projected image is 7 feet across. Fan is a little loud when plugged in, but not bad. Significantly better than other Pico's I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: dborman

customer_reviews.title: This product is an amazing micro projector
customer_reviews.text: This product is an amazing micro projector. I use it daily in my classroom. Also, I use to live in two states for a year and I traveled with this product from state to state on planes, etc. and it held up to the wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer from Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good picture/colors, especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good picture/colors, especially for the price. Won't work in bright-ish rooms, without the lights off, but otherwise pretty bright for a pico.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Pautz

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality is clear and crisp.
customer_reviews.text: I just love my projector. It's so convenient to take to work or wherever I need it. The quality on the picture is great. It nice and clear and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Horrible remote and problems with the file type.
customer_reviews.text: The remote control is the main reason for the poor review. It's so cheap and terrible to use. The remote that came with the projector does not have the same buttons as the drawing of the remote in the manual. We also had a lot of problems getting the right file type to play, for something that we thought should be really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little projector. Quality images. Plan on using it for outside movie watching with friends & family.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny_Wadd

customer_reviews.title: Whole case is vibrating!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and clear image. However, the entire plastic case vibrates loudly and the sound only goes away if I squeeze the top and bottom of the projector housing together. It sounds like the fan used to keep it cool is causing the housing vibration, making the unit way to noisy and distracting to use unless you crank up your connected audio. This would not be good for business use which is what I needed it for. I realize this might be a faulty unit. Too bad, otherwise seems nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jymn E.

product_meta.title: AAXA P300 Pico Projector with Rechargeable Battery - Native HD resolution with 500 LED Lumens, For Business, Home Theater, Travel and more
product_meta.description:
AAXA Technologies is excited to announce the release of our P300 Pico projector - the world's brightest battery-powered HD pocket projector. The new P300 features a revolutionary new compact optical engine capable of delivering 400 peak lumens at a high-definition (HD) resolution of 1280x800. Powered by Texas Instruments' DLP Technology the AAXA P300 employs Vibrant Color LED technology that delivers dazzling color quality with an operating life of more than 15,000 hours and is capable of generating a viewing experience of up to 120"*

BOX CONTAINS
P300 Pico Projector 
User Manual 
Wall Power Adapter (Type G) 
Compositive A/V Cable 
VGA Adapter Cable 
Tripod 
Remote Control
feature_bullets: Native 1280x800 HD resolution - with 1080P Max Input, featuring Texas Instruments DLP technology to achieve crisp and clear image.
High brightness in its class - 500 lumens optical engine with vibrant color technology. 20, 000 hours Premium LEDs ensure there is no need for lamp replacement
Onboard media player - paired with built-in speaker to allow movie and image playback directly from microSD card or USB flash drive. Wide range of inputs - HDMI, Mini VGA, composite A/V
Ultra portable size, battery included - at just 5.9" X 3.9" X 1.6" In size and weighs only .97 lbs with a 60 min rechargeable lithium-ion battery.
Perfect for business and home use - with up to 120" Projection (in low light conditions). Includes remote and mini Tripod for easy setup and navigation

specifications.Customer reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
